Plot: At the port of Sète, Mr. Slimani, a tired 60-year-old, drags himself toward a shipyard job that has become more and more difficult to cope with as the years go by. He is a divorced father ...
Title: The Secret of the Grain
Actors: Habib Boufares, Hafsia Herzi, Farida Benkhetache, Abdelhamid Aktouche
tomatoConsensus: A complex portrait of an immigrant family, The Secret of the Grain is a sprawling, intimate film with many fine performances.
